articles.title: Call of Duty Warzone: Plagiarism Accusations Surface Around New Dog Operator Design - IGN
articles.description: The developers of Call of Duty Warzone have been accused of plagiarism, after a new dog-themed Operator skin was found to look extremely similar to a years-old concept design from an artist not involved with the game.
